dt: {bc}a race having a specified number of {d_link|laps|lap:3}

dt.t: The last Superstars 100-{wi}lapper{/wi} is being considered the best short track race in the history of the Speedway …

shortdef: a race having a specified number of laps —used in combination

dt: {bc}one that {d_link|laps|lap:4} up food or drink with the tongue

dt.t: More than one reviewer noted that Carey's cat, first seen when her character is a little girl, must be the Methuselah of pets—or a longtime {wi}lapper{/wi} of Geritol-flavored Fancy Feast.

shortdef: one that laps up food or drink with the tongue
